LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceNextToRail: Industriell dytter på være plassert slik at: Hvitt lys - transportbånd, lager eller lagerbygning, Blå/grønn lys - transportbånd.
LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceBetweenRailAndStockp: Industriell draer må plasseres slik at: hvitt lys - transportbånd eller lager, blå/grønt lys - transportbånd eller lager.
LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceNextToGrowzoneAndRai: Growing zone puller must be placed so that: White glow - growing zone, Aqua glow - roller or stockpile
LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceNextToUndergroundInp: Underground roller output must be placed in range of a built Underground roller input.
